trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Hhesayo is seeking help with a fruitful endeavor.
TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_TODO_00<tab>Use the curious nopalitender powder at the designated location.
TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_TODO_01<tab>Lie in wait at the designated location, then slay the fruitful nopalitender that appears and obtain succulent-looking tuna.
TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the succulent-looking tuna to Hhesayo.

TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_HHESAYO_000_001<tab>Excuse me, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. I don't mean to be presumptuous, but you're one of those venturesome travelers I've heard so much about, aren't you?
TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_HHESAYO_000_002<tab>I'm looking for help procuring tuna. It's well loved by connoisseurs of fruit, but what I require is no ordinary tuna.

TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_HHESAYO_000_003<tab>No, the fruit I'm after comes from a particularly fruitful nopalitender. While I'd normally be happy to go out and hunt for it myself, they're as big as a house. I'd be stomped into the ground or impaled before I could even get close.
TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_HHESAYO_000_004<tab>If you're willing, take this powder and sprinkle it about in the field to the north of town. One of the bastards is sure to show up before long.
TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_HHESAYO_000_005<tab>I don't know why, but nopalitenders can't get enough of that powder. Sprinkle it about and they're sure to come running.
TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_HHESAYO_000_015<tab>There you are! Any luck with the nopalitender?
TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_HHESAYO_000_016<tab>You actually did it! I've never seen such a juicy tuna.

TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_HHESAYO_000_017<tab>They're said to promote good health, you know. My parents would give them to me on special occasions when I was a kid, as it's believed they help fortify a child's constitution.
TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_HHESAYO_100_017<tab>In fact, I've heard the Shetona crush up the stalks to use for weaning.

TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_HHESAYO_000_018<tab>As for why I hoped to procure this rare treat, it's nearly my daughter's nameday, and I thought this might cheer her up considering all that's happened recently.
TEXT_KINGZE004_05122_HHESAYO_000_020<tab>I don't have much, but please, take this. You've more than earned it.
